BreadcrumbDescription: Using the Sightless Eye we learned of Lilith's intentions. Lorath says he has a plan that can stop her, but admits we will need help. He's given me a letter to deliver to Donan.
BreadcrumbHeader: Meet Donan at the Cathedral of Light
Callback7Header: Meet Donan at the Cathedral of Light
